title: KPop Demon Hunters Mystery Saja Youtooz Vinyl Figure
body_html:
Gwi-Ma's new scheme to break free from the Honmoon has sent Mystery to Youtooz for his debut!

Standing at 4.8 inches tall and throwing his arms to either side as he twists on the spot, long pale purple hair falls effortlessly from underneath the wide brim of the hat atop his head to cover his (probably gorgeous) demonic face. Dressed all in black and wearing a simple vest underneath a long flowing coat, stylish sneakers, and the grey chains around his waist add a pop of modernity to his traditional outfit.

The exterior of the packaging sees his silhouette against a pink and purple flaming background, while the interior is filled with a deep purple that's covered in small white dots. The protective sleeve is then a deep pink to purple gradient with thin lines wrapping over its surface as his figure can be seen through the larg,e clear window at the packaging's front. This collectible ships in a matte, embossed, protective outer sleeve and a custom-sized plastic protector for maximum protection during shipping.

  • Preorder figure is non-refundable
  • Size: Height: 4.8"
